seed_pair.target: We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.
seed_pair.known: No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera la verdad

S0066: no es difícil | encontrar | la respuesta
it's not difficult | to find | the to answer
S0067: por qué | quieres parar | quieres | parar
why | you want to stop | you want | to stop
S0068: what | are you looking for | looking for
S0069: no quería | cuidar | el perro joven | toda la tarde
he didn't want | to look after | the young dog | all afternoon
S0070: ella no quería | no quería | decirme | dónde estaba
she didn't want | didn't want | to to tell me | where it was

practice_phrases: We didn't want that.
No queríamos eso.
We didn't want to go.
No queríamos ir.
We didn't want to to be here.
No queríamos estar aquí.
We didn't want to to start now.
No queríamos comenzar ahora.
We didn't want to to help you today.
No queríamos ayudarte hoy.
We didn't want to think about it.
No queríamos pensar sobre eso.
We didn't want to interrupt the story this afternoon.
No queríamos interrumpir la historia esta tarde.
We didn't want to think about what's going to to happen.
No queríamos pensar sobre lo que va a ocurrir.
We didn't want to to take too much time now.
No queríamos tomar demasiado tiempo ahora.
We didn't want to to start talking before you finish.
No queríamos comenzar a hablar antes de que termines.
We wanted to let you to speak.
Queríamos permitir que hables.
We wanted to let you finish now.
Queríamos permitir que termines ahora.
We wanted to let you to speak Spanish.
Queríamos permitir que hables español.
We didn't want to let you finish today.
No queríamos permitir que termines hoy.
We wanted to let someone hear the story.
Queríamos permitir que alguien oyera la historia.
We didn't want to let anyone hear that.
No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera eso.
We wanted to let you to speak with my friends.
Queríamos permitir que hables con mis amigos.
We didn't want to let anyone hear.
No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera.
I didn't want to let anyone hear that.
No quería permitir que nadie oyera eso.
We didn't want to let anyone hear the story.
No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera la historia.
We didn't want to let anyone hear that today.
No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera eso hoy.
He didn't want to let anyone hear his name.
Él no quería permitir que nadie oyera su nombre.
She didn't want to let anyone hear where it was.
Ella no quería permitir que nadie oyera dónde estaba.
I didn't want to let anyone hear about it.
No quería permitir que nadie oyera sobre eso.
I didn't want anyone to hear.
No quería que nadie oyera.
He didn't want anyone to hear that.
Él no quería que nadie oyera eso.
She didn't want anyone to hear the story.
Ella no quería que nadie oyera la historia.
We wanted no one to hear the truth.
Queríamos que nadie oyera la verdad.
I didn't want anyone to hear what I wanted to to say.
No quería que nadie oyera lo que quería decir.
The truth is important.
La verdad es importante.
I to know the truth.
Sé la verdad.
I want to to know the truth.
Quiero saber la verdad.
She didn't want to to say the truth.
Ella no quería decir la verdad.
We need to to know the truth now.
Necesitamos saber la verdad ahora.
He wants to to find out the truth.
Él quiere descubrir la verdad.
I didn't want anyone to hear the truth.
No quería que nadie oyera la verdad.
She wanted to to tell me the truth about it.
Ella quería decirme la verdad sobre eso.
We need to to know the truth about what's going to to happen.
Necesitamos saber la verdad sobre lo que va a ocurrir.
We didn't want to let anyone hear the truth.
No queríamos permitir que nadie oyera la verdad.
